CustomField.description: The distance surcharge is calculated based on the Service type and Distance input combination for 'Local Pickup and Delivery Services' Product. For any distance entered above 15 km, each km will cost $1 extra for three service types including 'Delivery Service', 'Pickup Service', 'Pickup & Delivery At the same time' and 'Consolidated Delivery', or cost $2 extra for 'Combined Pickup & Delivery Service' only.
CustomField.formula: IF( APT_LPD_Distance_Facility_Provided_In_Km__c > 15, IF( ISPICKVAL(APT_LPD_Service_Type__c , 'Combined Pickup & Delivery Service'), (APT_LPD_Distance_Facility_Provided_In_Km__c - 15)* 2, IF( ISPICKVAL(APT_LPD_Service_Type__c , 'Consolidated Delivery'), (APT_LPD_Distance_Facility_Provided_In_Km__c - 15)* 1, IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(APT_LPD_Service_Type__c , 'Delivery Service'), ISPICKVAL(APT_LPD_Service_Type__c , 'Pickup Service'), ISPICKVAL(APT_LPD_Service_Type__c , 'Pickup & Delivery At the same time') ), (APT_LPD_Distance_Facility_Provided_In_Km__c - 15)* 1, 0 ) ) ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Distance Surcharge
